title: Ep - 48 - Radio Andy Host and Former Watch What Happens Live Producer John Hill
description:
Radio Andy Host and Former Watch What Happens Live Producer John Hill gives inside scoop on working at Bravo and producing reality shows including Tori and Dean: Inn Love. Plastic surgeon Jonathan Zelken explains what injections and surgeries housewives from New York, Atlanta, Beverly Hills, and Dallas get. Brandy and Julie from Dumb, Gay Politics podcast and The People's Couch review an episode of Little People, Big World.



See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
